description: Novel, innovative features that don't exist in mainstream speedcubing apps including AI coaching, video analysis, accessibility features, AR experiences, and biomechanical analysis.

userStories.title: AI Solve Coach - Data Collection and Model Setup
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to set up infrastructure for collecting solve data and training ML models for AI coaching.
acceptanceCriteria: Database schema for solve analytics (phase times, patterns)
Data collection pipeline for solve metrics
Export solve data in training-ready format

userStories.title: AI Solve Coach - Pattern Analysis
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want AI to analyze my solve patterns and identify weaknesses.
acceptanceCriteria: Analyze solve time distribution and trends
Identify slow phases (if smart cube data available)
Compare user's times to their historical average

userStories.title: AI Solve Coach - Personalized Recommendations
userStories.description: As a speedcuber wanting to improve, I want personalized training recommendations based on my weaknesses.
acceptanceCriteria: Recommend specific areas to focus on
Suggest algorithm practice based on detected slowness
Natural language explanations for each recommendation

userStories.title: AI Solve Coach - Chat Interface
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want to chat with an AI coach to ask questions about improvement.
acceptanceCriteria: Context-aware (knows user's solve history and stats)
Cite specific data (your Ao12 is X, try Y)

userStories.title: Video Recording - Camera Access and Setup
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want the app to access my camera so it can record solves.

userStories.title: Video Recording - Automatic Solve Recording
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want solves to be automatically recorded on video.
acceptanceCriteria: Start recording when timer enters 'ready' state
Save video with solve metadata (time, scramble, date)
Store locally with option to upload to cloud

userStories.title: Video Recording - Playback and Review
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want to watch recorded solves to review my technique.
acceptanceCriteria: Video player in solve history details
Timer overlay shows current time at each point

userStories.title: Video Analysis - Cube State Recognition Model
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a computer vision model that can recognize cube state from video.
acceptanceCriteria: Train CNN model to detect cube orientation and colors
Model runs on-device (TensorFlow Lite or ONNX)

userStories.title: Video Analysis - Move Sequence Reconstruction
userStories.description: As a cuber without a smart cube, I want the app to reconstruct my solve from video.
acceptanceCriteria: Analyze video frame-by-frame to detect moves
Generate move sequence (R U R' U' ...)
Display confidence score for each detected move
Processing time < 2x real-time (1-min solve in <2 mins)

userStories.title: Accessibility - Screen Reader Optimization
userStories.description: As a visually impaired speedcuber, I want full screen reader support so I can use the timer independently.
acceptanceCriteria: ARIA labels on all interactive elements
Keyboard navigation works for all features
Announce timer state changes to screen reader

userStories.title: Accessibility - Audio Feedback and Voice Control
userStories.description: As a visually impaired cuber, I want audio feedback and voice control for hands-free operation.
acceptanceCriteria: Audio feedback for timer state transitions

userStories.title: Accessibility - High Contrast and Large Text Modes
userStories.description: As a low-vision user, I want high contrast themes and adjustable text sizes.
acceptanceCriteria: Large touch targets (minimum 44px, up to 200px configurable)
No loss of functionality when zoomed

userStories.title: Accessibility - Haptic Feedback
userStories.description: As a user with visual or hearing impairments, I want haptic feedback for timer states.
acceptanceCriteria: Vibration patterns for timer states (ready, start, stop)

userStories.title: Achievement System - Achievement Database Schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a database for tracking achievements and unlocks.
acceptanceCriteria: Achievement definitions table (id, name, description, criteria)

userStories.title: Achievement System - Achievement Detection
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want to automatically earn achievements when I hit milestones.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect consistency achievements (10 consecutive solves within range)
Award achievement and save to database

userStories.title: Achievement System - Achievement Notifications
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want celebratory notifications when I earn achievements.

userStories.title: Achievement System - Progressive Unlocks
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want to unlock themes and features by earning achievements.
acceptanceCriteria: Unlock new themes (earn sub-15 unlocks speed theme)
At least 10 unlockable items at launch

userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want daily challenges to keep me motivated to practice.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate new daily challenge at midnight (user timezone)
Challenge types (achieve Ao5 under X, complete 20 solves, beat your Ao12)
Reward XP or special badge on completion

userStories.title: Gamification - Streak Tracking
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want to track consecutive days of solving to build a habit.
acceptanceCriteria: Track consecutive days with at least 1 solve
Grace period (1 miss per week allowed)

userStories.title: AR Scramble Visualization - Cube Detection
userStories.description: As a visual learner, I want AR to detect my physical cube so I can overlay information on it.
acceptanceCriteria: Use device camera to detect cube in frame
Display bounding box around detected cube

userStories.description: As a user, I want AR to recognize my cube's current state to verify scrambles.
acceptanceCriteria: Recognize cube state from camera (all visible faces)
Display recognized state as virtual cube

userStories.title: AR Scramble Visualization - Tutorial Overlays
userStories.description: As a beginner, I want AR arrows showing me the next move in a scramble or algorithm.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect when move is completed (advance automatically)

userStories.title: Fitness Integration - Calorie Estimation
userStories.description: As a health-conscious cuber, I want to see estimated calories burned during solving sessions.
acceptanceCriteria: Estimate calories based on session duration and intensity

userStories.description: As a fitness tracker user, I want cubing sessions exported to Apple Health or Google Fit.
acceptanceCriteria: Export session as 'Mind & Body' or custom activity
Include duration, calories, heart rate (if available)
Privacy controls for health data sharing

userStories.title: Ergonomic Analysis - Hand Tracking Setup
userStories.description: As a high-volume speedcuber, I want the app to track my hand movements to prevent injury.
acceptanceCriteria: Use camera to track hand/wrist movements (MediaPipe)

userStories.title: Ergonomic Analysis - Strain Detection
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want to be warned about risky hand positions that could cause injury.

userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want guided warm-up exercises before sessions to prevent injury.
acceptanceCriteria: Recommendation to warm up before session

userStories.description: As an experienced cuber, I want to offer mentorship to help beginners improve.
acceptanceCriteria: Mentor profile page (bio, average times, rating)
Verification system (verify sub-X times with video)
Review and rating system for mentors

userStories.title: Mentor-Mentee System - Matching Algorithm
userStories.description: As a beginner, I want to be matched with a compatible mentor who can help me improve.
acceptanceCriteria: Matching based on skill gap (mentor > mentee)
Method matching (CFOP mentor for CFOP learner)

userStories.title: Mentor-Mentee System - Shared Dashboard
userStories.description: As a mentor, I want to view my mentee's progress and assign practice routines.
acceptanceCriteria: Shared dashboard with mentee's solve history
Privacy controls (mentee can hide specific data)

userStories.description: As a competitive cuber, I want to participate in hourly global events with the same scramble.

userStories.description: As a participant, I want to see live results as other cubers complete the event.
acceptanceCriteria: Leaderboard updates within 1 second of solve submission

Manual review system for flagged users

Date and number formatting per locale

userStories.description: As a community member, I want to contribute translations in my language.
acceptanceCriteria: Integration with Crowdin or similar platform

acceptanceCriteria: Spotify API integration for playlist creation
Update playlists based on current TPS trends
Privacy-respecting (no data sent to music providers)

userStories.title: Music Integration - Metronome and Audio Cues
userStories.description: As a speedcuber, I want a metronome to practice consistent turning speed.

userStories.description: As a cuber, I want a virtual pet that grows with my solving activity.

userStories.description: As a cuber, I want my pet to react to my solves to make practice more fun.
